body:
Wanda x Vision appreciation post

I honestly don’t know why this ship is so underrated. Some people find it weird, which I sort of understand. He’s a robot and she’s a human with weird powers. But that’s my favorite part about it. They’re both very different and it adds to their chemistry. The fact that vision so effortlessly offered up his life for her and half the universe makes me love them even more. Infinity war was heartbreaking for everyone, but after seeing it a few times , I’m mostly affected by (spoilers) the scene where vision convinces her to destroy the stone. Why am I sitting here ranting about a relationship between a woman and a walking toaster? I don’t know. I just wanted to appreciate them :”)

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Time Will Tell
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2CVe36R

by TonyStarkissist

So… some weird stuff is going on. First the dreams, then Peter calls him dad, and now everyone is convinced Peter is his illegitimate son. What a day.

Or: Infinity War was crazy so I made it a little crazier.

Everything is pure fluff except the first chapter. It doesn’t get really weird and whacky until like chapter 8 so you’re safe.

Words: 2704, Chapters: 1/12, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Pepper Potts, Happy Hogan, Steve Rogers, Clint Barton, Sam Wilson, Natasha Romanov, James “Bucky” Barnes, Thor, Bruce Banner, Stephen Strange, Ned Leeds, May Parker
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Pepper Potts & Tony Stark, Peter Parker & James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Avengers Team
  • Additional Tags: Tony Stark is a total Dad, Rhodey is the best uncle, Sassy Peter, Precious Peter Parker, Peter Parker Has a Family, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, Irondad, spiderson, Weird Infinity war twist type thing, I dont even really know how to describe it, Its good trust me, marvel AU, Time Travel, Other dimensions and stuff, Whacky stuff later on, Cant say too much or ill spoil it, Crack, But also serious, preciousness, Fluff, just a tiny bit of Angst, mostly in the first chapter, The Avengers think Peter is Tonys son, And Tony doesnt deny it, Protective Tony Stark


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2CVe36R
